channel.title: ReactNative on SwiSwiSwift
channel.description: Recent content in ReactNative on SwiSwiSwift

item.title: Build input file cannot be found: Libraries/WebSocket/libfishhook.aâ€™
item.description: Reference: Xcode 10 libfishhook.a cannot be found When I updated Xcode to 10.0, I got the above error and couldn't compile ReactNative. RTCWebSocket.xcodeproject -> RCTWebSocket -> Select Build Phases -> Add libfishhook.

item.title: Turning an image into a button with ReactNative(TouchableOpacity)
item.description: This is a sample implementation of TouchableOpacity, which turns a view such as an image into a button in ReactNative. Tap on an image of Kabigon to get an alert.

item.title: Display text in ReactNative
A note on the commands that are only used occasionally in ReactNative
item.description: This is an important comment note that I use only occasionally in ReactNative. Installing react-native-cli globally with npm npm install -g react-native-cli react-native -v Create a project

item.title: Show the indicator in ReactNative
Display an image with ReactNative
item.description: This is a sample of displaying an image with ReactNative. If you want to retrieve images from the Internet on iOS, you need to set up ATS, so be careful.

item.title: Specifying the size of the View in FlexBox
item.description: This is a sample code to specify the size of the View with FlexBox. react-native: 0.56.0 The purple, ochre, and light blue views are at a height of 1 : 2 : 3.

item.title: Displaying a FlatList in ReactNative
Display the button with ReactNative
item.description: This is a sample of displaying a button in ReactNative. Press the button to display the alarm. react-native: 0.56.0 (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).
